definitions.definition: A spray or shower of droplets hitting a surface.
A spot or spots of a substance spattered on a surface.
examples: There was what looked like a spatter of blood on one wall.

definitions.definition: The sound of droplets hitting a surface.
A burst or series of sounds resembling the sound of droplets hitting a surface.
A collection of objects scattered like droplets splashed onto a surface.

main_definition: A spray or shower of droplets hitting a surface.
secondary_definitions: A spot or spots of a substance spattered on a surface.
The sound of droplets hitting a surface.
( figuratively ) A burst or series of sounds resembling the sound of droplets hitting a surface.
( figuratively ) A collection of objects scattered like droplets splashed onto a surface.
